channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Sympa Lists Transitioning to Single Sign-On Starting January 8, 2025
item.description: Starting January 8, 2025, Sympa will transition to using Single Sign-On (SSO) for login. A new “RPI Single Sign-On” button will be added to the top-right corner of the Sympa login page, and community members with RPI email addresses must use this button to log in. Non-RPI email addresses can continue to use the existing email/password login method.
item.author: Community

item.title: Employees Recognize Peers at 2024 Faculty/Staff Benefits Expo
item.description: RPI employees shared their appreciation for their colleagues at this year’s Faculty and Staff Benefits Expo; a big “thank you” to all who submitted a shout-out!
item.author: Community

item.title: Drug Free Schools Act Annual Notification
item.description: The health and safety of our RPI community is of utmost importance. In furtherance of our efforts to enhance the wellbeing of our students, staff, and faculty, and in compliance with the Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act (DFSCA), we have reviewed and updated Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute’s Drug-Free Schools and Campus Regulations Annual Notification.
item.author: Community

item.title: vonHousen Named Liberty League Women’s Cross Country Rookie of the Year
item.description: Erin vonHousen of the Rensselaer women’s cross country team has been named the 2024 Liberty League women’s cross country Rookie of the Year, while Head Coach John Lynch and assistants were recognized as the League’s top coaching staff this season.
item.author: Community

item.title: Libraries Selected as ScienceDirect AI Search Pilot
item.description: RPI Libraries have been selected for early access to a feature leveraging Generative AI on ScienceDirect, home of the largest collection of peer-reviewed books and research journal articles. The AI feature searches through the full text of thousands of papers at once, looking for the insights most relevant for your specific needs.
item.author: Community

item.title: A Reminder Regarding Mediasite Classroom Recording for Spring 2025
item.description: Multimedia Services reminds all faculty to submit their requests for course recordings in supported classrooms for the spring 2025 semester. Requests will be processed beginning January 2, 2025 for the start of classes the following week.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: DotCIO Schedules Server Upgrades for December 21, 22
item.description:
DotCIO will be performing necessary server upgrades over the winter break. From midnight through 11:59pm on Saturday, December 21, an update to IACSDept.win.rpi.edu will affect S drive for campus and V drive for departments. An update to IACSHome.win.rpi.edu from 9:00am to 1:00pm on Sunday, December 22 will affect all U drives (home directories).

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
